title: Azerbaijani (1922) Bible
description: Azerbaijan Bible published in 1922. Azerbaijan is the official language of the Republic of Azerbaijan.
provider: The British and Foreign Bible Society

language.name: South Azerbaijani
language.area: East and West Azerbaijan, Ardebil, Zanjan, and part of Markazi provinces. districts of Tehran; Fars Province and scattered. Also in Afghanistan, Azerbaijan, Iraq, Jordan, Syria, Turkey (Asia), United States.
